titles.title: A joint resolution commending the Cuban "Declaration of Freedom".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/8/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the "Declaration of Freedom" adopted by Cuban exiles should be patriotically considered by all Cubans in exile; (2) such declaration should serve to unite those pledged to restoring Cuban liberty and independence; and (3) it should be the objective the United States to commend and encourage recognition and respect for the declaration.
